string.name: name
string.value: The Secret of the Golden Feather
#b#@9201119:##k in #bPerion#k says there is something you need in order to identify the #rGolden Feather#k.

Let's collect the following materials in order to accurately identify the #rGolden Feather#k.

20 #rLeaves#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k.)
5 #rFlints#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k.)

Report back to #b#@9201119:##k in #bPerion#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@9201119:##k in #bPerion#k says you must inform #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k of this.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 4,500 Able to proceed to 'A Burglar Demon' as next quest.
Looking at this #rGolden Feather#k makes me uneasy.\nOh, but I have a traditional magic spell that can reveal the mystery of this feather. First, I need you to collect some items for me.

I need to build a fire that emits monster's aura, and in order to do so, I need 20 #rLeafs#k and 5 #rFlints#k. You can acquire both of those items from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k.
What? Are you saying you don't want to?

You've brought everything I've asked you to collect.
Shall we begin the magic spell now?

(The Training Instructor lights a fire and begins to set the Golden Feather on fire.)

This must be...

What is this monster?
It looks like a lion, yet it also resembles a mule.

It looks like a demon! It couldn't be a real demon, right? This gets me so nervous!
